short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever forget to eat? Stay healthy and never forget your meals with Munch Monitor!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Never miss a meal with Munch Monitor! This simple tool allows you to set custom reminders for eating at intervals that suit your lifestyle. We've all had moments slaving away at our computers to the point we forget to eat. This extension ensures you take the time to nourish yourself.

Features:
- Custom Reminders for any duration--hours, minutes, or both--tailored to your lifestyle
- Easy-to-use interface for quick access and reminder settings
- Persistent widgets that walk across your screen, ensuring you remember to take breaks and refuel

Don't let your busy life distract you from taking care of yourself. Install Munch Monitor and remember to eat!
